resources.string:
1. Dont smoke or use tobacco.

2.Exercise for about 30 minutes on most days of
	the week. 

3.Eat a heart-healthy diet like Avoid too much salt
	and sugars in your diet. 

4.Maintain a healthy blood pressure.

5.Maintain a healthy weight.

6.Get enough quality sleep. 

7.Finding alternative ways to manage stress such 
	as physical activity, relaxation exercises. 

8.Get regular health screenings such as Blood pres-
	sur,Cholesterol levels,Diabetes screening etc. 

9.Limit your calories.

 10.Always maintain your Weight and body
	mass index(BMI). 

11.Walk away from the Standard American Diet 
	(SAD) such as fast food/fried food,meat,sweets,high
	salt etc. 

12.Spend quality time alone and pursue peacefulness
		 15-30 minutes daily, removing yourself from life 
	stressors.

13.Turn off the TV. 

14.Eat greens, beans, vibrant colors (fruits and veg.)
	whole grains, nuts and seeds. 

15.Know your numbers Cholesterol,LDL, HDL,
	Triglycerides,Fasting Glucose,and in some cases 
	hs-CRP, Vitamin D,Vitamin B12, insulin levels,
	HbA1c, and Coronary Calcium Score. 

Normal Blood pressure is 130/80 or less.
	Normal BMI is 20 â€“ 25.
